function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Decline in urban park use during the pandemic","Impact":"Limited access to greenspace, potential negative health impacts","Mitigation":"Implement strategies to increase access to greenspace, promote outdoor activities","Technologies":"Community engagement, urban planning, public health campaigns","People":"Residents of urban areas","Owner":"Local governments, urban planning agencies"},{"Description":"Racial and socioeconomic disparities in COVID-19 impact and access to greenspace","Impact":"Negative physical and psychological impact on BIPOC and low-income communities","Mitigation":"Invest in equitable access to parks, address environmental justice issues, support diverse communities","Technologies":"Community development programs, urban renewal projects, public health initiatives","People":"BIPOC residents, low-income communities","Owner":"Government agencies, community organizations"},{"Description":"Magnification of disparities in urban park use and access during COVID-19","Impact":"Exacerbated suffering and negative health outcomes in socially vulnerable populations","Mitigation":"Conduct targeted research, advocate for policy changes, invest in community resources","Technologies":"Data analysis, advocacy platforms, community engagement tools","People":"Socially vulnerable populations","Owner":"Research institutions, advocacy groups"}]}
